content.detailedDescription: I was taking out the garbage tonight, during a snow storm, when from behind me i noticed a flash like lightning.  i turned to look where it came from and saw a couple standing outside their car in the parking lot pointing up at the sky, then i saw another flash.  when i looked up i realized what we were all looking at was a normal looking cloud cover but you could clearly make out red flashes of light coming from above them.  the flashes changed from red to yellow at times, but it was definately not lighting, and you could tell from the reaction of the others that they felt the same thing.  the cloud just continued on it's course, sometimes flashing red, then yellow, until it just stopped.  if you have ever seen "close encounters of the third kind", it was similar to the part when the small boy is abducted by the moving, flashing cloud covering the ufo.
content.summary: Lit cloud

content.detailedDescription: My wife's cousin was taking pictures of deer in her backyard in green river, wyoming. she did not notice the object in the background until she began to upload the pictures onto her computer.
content.summary: My wife's cousin took this picture in her backyard.

content.detailedDescription: I first sited aprox 20 silver disc shaped objects flying in formation from the northeast headed towards the southwest at aprox 25 - 30k feet. at first glance i thought they were geese however after watching them for a few minutes i realized they were not birds but silver discs and they were rotating and reflecting bright light as they turned. i ran in the house and got my video camera that i had rigged up after seeing these things earlier in the month i wanted to see if i could get a close up view of them if i ever saw them again. i filmed these objects back on november 6th but the video was kind of shakey so this time i was prepared with a tripod and a 500x zoom lens. when i returned outside with my camera the first group was gone and i saw another large group flying over but they disapeared by the time i got my camera setup to start filming. i gazed into the sky for several minutes when i saw 2 single discs flying over and i filmed them as well as several others over the next 45 minutes. some were silver rotating discs that flashed bright lite as they turned others were a brite fire orange/red color. i have several minutes of video if anyone is interested they can contact me. these objects can be seen almost on any day when the sky is very clear with no haze watch for what may seem to be a star like object high in the sky over houston texas. the video i am uploading shows one disc and another zoom past it from the bottom of the screen to the top left corner. the video was shot with a sony trv-730 hi8 video and a 500x zoom lens. i have several more minutes video available for the asking.
content.summary: Several ufo's seen moving from the northeast to the southwest over houston

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were traveling north on hwy 580 towards hwy 13 when we saw a 3 brilliant bright lights (changing colors - green, red, white)in the sky over the freeway. as we continued on the freeway, i opened up our sunroof in the car and as we traveled directly underneath i could see the black massive triangular shaped object hovering above with no sound, the lights all turned white. i watched it slowly travel south through the rear window. no longer was the triangle in view only 3 tail white lights. we exited the freeway to get back on heading south (same direction as object)but could not see it any longer. i lived near an sfo for over 20 years and worked for the airlines for a short period of time - this object was not a plane.
content.summary: Large black triangle shaped ufo hovering over hwy 580

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: i went outside to take the dogs out, when i looked up, i saw several starlike objects moving west in the sky.I called for my fiance, her son beat her to it. he came out, looked up, and saw them also. he yelled for his mom, she came and looked,and saw them.She went inside and grsbbed the camera while we stayed out and observed for about 15 minutes. they were different magnitudes,they were moving in a westerly direction about 1 degree every second. i had to make sure this wasnt an illusion with the clouds flying by as they had just opened up.I know how the stars are suppose to look in their constellations since ive studied astronomy since childhood and these didnt belong. they were also moving faster relative to the stars. they covered a width of about 10 degrees, and an area from east to west of about 50 degrees.The first thing that came to our minds was an invasion.I saw 3 jets that appeared to be commercial airliners,not sure, moving in the same direction. the jets appeared to be lower and i dont think they were affiliated with this. there was also another jet which was heading north. i reported this on a website called,,,*(name of website moved to additional evidence section--cms/sg),,, in the encounters section 2 days later.Myself,my fiance, and her son were all witnesses of this occurance.I also went back inside after viewing this for about 15 minutes to grab the binoculars. by the time id gotten them and went back outside, the last of the objects were on their way west although i was able to view about 3 of them in the binoculars. they still appeared starlike with no form other than that.Their was 2 triangular shapes but im not certain if they tried to make that formation since there were so many. they only explanation that i can give as to why other people didnt observe this is that the clouds had just opened up from what it appeared, and the moon was full.These objects were of different magnitudes.We did get some videos of it,we think,but were unable to download because the usb cable is damaged.Were uncertain if anythings on it though. i personally dont think the camera has enough resolution to get anything but im not sure.
content.summary: About 100 or more spanning several constellations

content.detailedDescription:
1. we where sitting on in the livingroom whatching tv and i looked out the glass door and saw a weird contrail that was not there 5 minutes before.
my daughter and my wife, and i went outside to get a better look and to check out the rest of the sky.
i took pictures and will post with this report. the direction of the contrail was 278 degrees west of my location at 1705 hrs. through 1815 hrs. dark.
the contrail seemed to appear out of nowhere and the angle of turn was 90 dergrees. as far as i know we have no aircraft that can make that kind of angle at speed fast enough to creat a contrail.

2. the shape and location.

3. a really weird looking contrail.

4. it was more like the aftermath or leavings of the object.

5. agitated and anxious.

6. it got dark.

note:
     it might be importent to know that there where clouds in the area and these clouds where moving with the breeze but the contrail remaind stationary.
content.summary: Weird contrail

content.detailedDescription:
Since november 6th every clear night we have been seeing this object in the southeastern part of the sky in spring, texas.  it has moved farther away since the first night we observed it.  it now appears smaller so i have no idea how far away it is.  it stays in the exact same location for at least an hour or more with red, green and amber lights that pulse and it goes from a bright white to a dim glow at times.  when it does move it is at an extremely slow rate and then it remains stationary for another long period of time.  we never see it before 2:00 a.M. and it is always gone by 5:00a.M. cst.  i would really like to know what this object is.  i'm thinking about buying a good telescope just so i can determine what it is.  i have been viewing it through binoculars and have been unable to get a photograph of it. 

1.  i was in my back yard taking the dog outside.
2.  i thought it was an airplane.  however, it remained stationary and did not move for hours.
3.  i thought is was an airplane.
4.  it remained stationary and had these pulsing red, green,and amber lights.  it also would dim from a bright white to a dull glow when airplanes
would go above or below it.
5.  on the first night it was a euphoric feeling that i had seen something so unusual. however, now that it keeps coming back night after night i am frustrated that i cannot determine what it is and why it is here.
6.  it usually goes behind trees or objects and fades away.
content.summary: Since november 6th my family has been seing this in the sky on clear nights.

content.detailedDescription: We have seen these lights approx. a dozen times or more now, since july 2010, all coloring the same, size and shape the same and all coming from approx. the same direction. we have seen any where from 3 to 4 up to 16 at highest count-because i don't have professional photo equipment nor do we ever know when they will appear it is difficult to capture them-i did however get video of the group on the 26th of october this year (2010). this was taken with a handheld small digital camera and is best viewed full screen-they are located lower left of screen-as i said this was not the best photo equipment and when looking at the view screen could not be seen so i was guessing and hoping i had it pointed in the correct direction. earlier in the summer we had a much better view of these craft as they appeared at dusk-as the lights went out you could still see a black round object in the sky-one of which slowly came across the lake in our direction and over the tree line. with each sighting there have been several witnesses in our area and there was no sound coming from the lights/objects. we actually thought of night operations from the military or any other thing we could come up with but these "lights" were often too close to one another and again there was no sound. i noted 2 other reports from our general area recently posted so felt i should also report as i believe in both cases we were seeing the same lights as their descriptions were quite similar as were the dates of both events.
content.summary: Several red/orange lights (8 or more) appeared then faded/disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
Looked up from our balcony facing southwest, directly up below where commuter planes would fly i saw a very bright orb in daylight.  it was reflecting the sun. it was wobbling.  i focused better to make sure it wasn't a seagull and saw another sphere just as bright but smaller rotating around the larger sphere in tandem like a a gyroscope.  it moved rather quickly in a southeast direction and i lost it behind trees directly in front of my balcony.  when i came back with my camera phone i couldn't find it.

it was a bit chilly that day, no big winds and no clouds in the area of siting.  i was mesmerized for the time i followed it in the sky.  i was not afraid.
content.summary: Large bright white sphere with another smaller sphere gyroscoping together

content.detailedDescription:
Ever since i had watched alison kruses' ufo videos i had been hooked and fascinated. i was thrown into the world of ufos and ets and i hoped very soon to see ufos in my area and video tape them and hopefully do something in this world to provide disclosure. 

but i had no idea what i was getting myself into. 

not that i regret it, but when i saw my first golden-fireball-type ufo sitting over the oldsmar bridge high in the sky, i never knew that i would have anything related to close contact. 

my friend jessi and i headed to walmart on november 11th, 2010. when i left my neighborhood, i saw my first "real" ufo sighting. a golden ball of light shining way brighter than any star(we call it  a "mini-sun ufo" in our group on youtube) i had an awesome glimpse of it going over the bridge and i somehow had lost interest in anything else after that. leaving walmart, however, i saw another golden mini sun in the sky right over the parking lot to the right side. i was very amazed. thinking back, it was probably the same one. i had no idea at the time. this one was moving very very slowly. but i made my friend stop to observe it with me. she was also amazed. nobody else stopped to look in the parking lot. they were too pre-occupied.

it kept getting closer and closer and the grip i had on my friend's sleeve grew tighter and tighter. and then it did something that would have confirmed a regular person that it was a plane. not me. i know what they are capable of. the ball of light shone brightly. it separated into two lights and then slowly but surely it took shape of a plane and flew directly over me. but this was not a plane. the lights were changing on it. some switched on and off, some had strobes. but there were no green and red navigational lights on the wings-- something that is required by law that a plane has to have. the shape of the planes suggested that it was a passenger plane. 

my friend might not have been convinced that it was a ufo but i was. i have seen the kind of fake plane phenomena before.  i was prepared. 

we left to go to hess. we stopped at a light and there was another mini sun ufo sitting in the sky. this time i had my camera. i was fully prepared. i had never seen this type of golden light before in the sky. i have lived here for 23 years. by two airports and this is not normal. 

after the light turned green and i was recording, we took a left turn and the ball started following the car. a little bit behind the car, but it kept perfect pace with the car. in the video, i wasn't surprised by that because i was 100% sure that they were following me. 

after we stopped at another light, the golden lighted ufo turned to fly over us, took shape of a plane and flew away. 


after that night, i started to be "followed. " 

the next night, november 12th, 2010, i went to the gas station with my boyfriend who was driving. there was a ball of light in perfect view of the station. i got it on camera. it hovered for 8 minutes, then started very slowly moving  and then started flashing like a regular aircraft and flew away. on our way up to new port richey, when we were passing a woodsy area in trinity, i saw another ball of light. this one keeping pace with the car. that is on the same video as the one at the gas station. the ball of light following our car side-by-side until it started flashing like they normally do and flew off overhead.

november 13th, i go searching by myself with my camera, and as soon as i get outside and into my car i see a white orb-like ufo spit a smaller white orb out of it's back end and fall to the ground. this was high in the sky so i couldn't drive towards it. that is where i became frightened. i was starting to see these ufos in my neighborhood. i went on my merry way. when i got to the outer side of the semi circle(my house is on the inner circle)of the neighborhood, i saw two white lights kind of tilted sitting in the sky. they couldn't have been headlights-- they were too far apart. i tried to fumble around with my camera but i couldn't get it to work. i drove hurriedly to the shopping center to see if i could get it on film as it passed over and i pulled my camera out just in time to film the fly-over. this fly-over was very different. it didn't look like a plane. it had two with lights far apart, two in the middle close together and one on the side. that is when i started to put two-and-two together-- they were following me. 

every night after that, my sightings have increased. when i step outside of my house, there are two golden mini-sun ufos sitting in the sky perfectly to where they can see me. if i had to describe how they are capable of this i would say that they can zoom in so far from such a distance that they can see everything you do. not only that but they can change their appearance to make it look like they are far away, when it reality they are much, much closer. when i get in my car to go somewhere, the golden lights follow me. they are always visible in my car. some time it will look like they are coming towards me when i am driving. when i get to a red light or a stop sign, the craft stops in mid air. when i take either a left turn or right turn, the craft also does so. a maneuver impossible for a regular aircraft. these crafts do not change lights when they turn. it looks like a plane that suddenly goes sideways. 

everywhere i go, they are there. the golden lights. i will try and show my friends but they all think they are planes. because the crafts are capable of blinking like a plane, everyone assumes they are planes. but the blinks are irregular. sometimes the blinking even stops for a few seconds and then continues. the lights constantly change numbers and colors and blinks. that is a violation of the aviation code. 

i believe they ufos are covered by a forced-sphere which allows them to shrink or expand their size. it also allows them to project holograms of any type of craft as well as take the form of any type of craft. they are anti-gravity and are capable of any kind of aerial maneuver possible. they can mimic the sound of the type of craft and change the lights on the type of craft also. 


that brings me to my close contact sighting. 

one day i was sitting in my house. the whole day i had heard a helicopter outside. all day this helicopter must have been flying around outside because the sound wouldn't stop.
i had a hunch. i wondered if these ufos wanted me to come outside so they were making a lot of noise. after all, if they can take different shapes, i thought, it would be easier for them to project sound. 
i finally got sick of the noise. i remember saying "alright. alright i'm coming. " out loud as i headed to the door. it was 4:30 pm. i walked outside and there was a helicopter sighting in the sky pointing towards me where the usual golden light ball was. i looked right up at it and it flew away. 

a few hours later, my boyfriend and i were heading to our friend's house in clearwater somewhere between the 14th and the 19th on november 2010 about 8 pm, we are about to pull up to the house when i see the biggest golden light i've seen so far. it must have been hovering the next street over. i looked directly at it and the light then dove very very fast into the trees the next street over and hid. i could see him through the trees. i yelled out loud because i had never seen such a thing in all of my life. it actually dove into the trees. i didn't have my camera that night, but when i got out of my car a giant helicopter came from the direction of where the golden light dove and flew over me. i couldn't see the helicopter. only the lights and i could hear the sound. it must have shape-shifted. i tried to call out of it to tell it that i didn't want it to go, and then one minute later the helicopter came back over the neighborhood and back to where the golden light i saw was. then two minutes later the helicopter came back over me and flew off. 
i heard the sound of a faint plane in the distance. a plane. and right as i was walked to my friend's garage, a plane that was about 3 stories from the ground flew over the neighborhood very fast and very low. it looked like an all gray plane with one engine and no windows. it had one red light on the left wing. the sound it made was very irregular for how low and close it was. i thought i was seeing things. then 5 minutes later the helicopter came from where the gold light ball had been and flew over me for a third time, but this time it sounded like a plane and not a helicopter. it was as if i was looking at a helicopter and hearing a plane. very strange. 

my boyfriend had consumed some beers and went around the side of our friend's house to pee and i followed him because i wanted to ask him about the helicopter. just then, a white semi-invisible object flew right past our bodies silently and up over the house next to my friend's. i stood there frozen. i turned to my boyfriend and i said "did you just see that? " expecting him to say no like he always does. but this time he said "you mean that shooting star over the neighbors house? " the orb-like thing flew past us....Which means that it was hiding on the side of the house watching me as i stood in the driveway watching the helicopter go by. 

i was being followed still. by these ufos/orbs/whatever they are. 

the next day i see the two headlight-type ufos in my neighborhood very close to my house. i got one in hd. it flew behind some trees and when it emerged it was a triangle shape. then it turned into a plane and flew away.

i have seen one-winged hologram planes fly over me i have seen hot pink planes. i have seen hotpink planes with hotpink contrails when nothing else in the sky is pink. i have seen batwinged shaped planes. the wings are back the tips of the wings look as thought they are bent backwards.
i see many things. golden orbs that turn into planes. 

i am being followed. every day. i feel that i am in danger. it was fun at first, but i don't want to be followed 24/7 anymore. 

links: please watch these videos. they coincide with my reports. 

the first video is the first time i saw these golden balls. i saw them with my friend jessi after we left walmart. 

the second video is the ufos i saw at the gas station and the one following my boyfriend's car on the way to trinity. 

the third one is the one i saw in my neighborhood when i pulled into the shopping center. the odd light formation.

i have many more sightings on youtube. my username is headlesspony.
i want people to see these videos.
i have the triangle sighting that i mentioned. i have sightings from the pier by my house.
i have the one-winged plane and the hotpink plane. they are in hd and you guys don't have enough attachment slots for me to unload all of my videos. 
please look at them.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: My ufo sighting has lasted almost a month.

content.detailedDescription:
As we turned east from cedar bayou rd onto massey tomkins rd in baytown at 18:05, we noticed 8 or 9 lights flying in a loose formation from the southest to the northwest at between 500 ft and 1000 ft altitude.  the lights were dimmer than halogen lights.  they almost reminded us of japanese lanterns, but the lights were not growing in intensity or decreasing in intensity as you would expect candle lights.  the wind at that time was blowing out of the south/southwest, so i assumed that the lighted objects were self-powered.  however, there was no sound coming from them.  if they were small planes or ultralight craft, we should've heard some type of noise.
i turned into a driveway on raccoon road to get out of the car and get a better look.  at that point, the objects headed in a more northerly direction.  there were two more that came from the same direction as the others that appeared to be speeding up to catch up with the original group.  
at that height, they appeared to be going approximately 50 to 75 mph.
we watched the lights head northerly until they were out of eye sight.  
is there any way to verify if there was an ultralight flight club that would've been out for the day?
content.summary: 8 or 9 lighted objects flying southeast to northwest, less than 1000 ft altitude

content.detailedDescription:
I exited my car, at the 1300 block of woodway, in houston, tx.  i looked up, and noticed this long trail in the sky.  i've never seen a trail like that, so i started taking pictures of it with my iphone.  i work with a former marine, and when i pointed to it in the sky he could not identify it.  we went into a nearby restaurant, and i continued to watch the object, from the window, for about 25 minutes.  i noticed the object make several turns, but it always appeared to be going in the same direction (down).  by the time we finished dinner, it was dark and i could not see the object.  

at first, i thought the object was probably a jet.  but, i later zoomed into the pictures, and noticed that the object appeared disc-like.
content.summary: Strange turning disc object

content.detailedDescription: I was with my son called [nick name removed/cms/tg]  and we were trying to find our dog called [dog's name removed/cms/tg]. suddenly, i felt an extremely big orgasm and i thought "omg,that can't be normal! i'm gonna die !" and then i saw that john was hurt too! then, we looked up to the sky and we saw a big light coming at us ! i first thought that it was the apocalypse! but then a fell down and i couldn't move my body at all! then john fell too ! i tried to speak but i wasn't able even to speak ! then, 3 human figures appeared, they took us in this huge light which seems to have landed. we can't remember much... but we suddenly woke up in a white room and we couldn't move our body but we could finally speak. then we saw these figures again... but they weren't human... they some kind of aliens like the well known "greys" i asked: "wtf is going on? were the #$%& are we? who the #$%& are you? what the #$%& do you want from us ?", they didn't open their mouths, but we could hear them in our minds !, they said that they are ones who are watching us all this million of years in the skies, the ones that took part in the creation of the man kind, the ones that are called the elochim, in the bible, we are the son's of the god, some hybrids called the nephelim in the bible live under your feet and they want humans to suffer, because they are at side of the fallen, we abducted you to bring this message to everyone, the truth will be soon revealed, but for we to know were you are we'll #$%& the crap out of you ! and then the freaky part begins, they took a huge organ that looked like a penis they put it in our tiny &*%#@ with all of their strength ! we were bleeding but they didn't care... it hurt to much ! we can't remember any more... but we woke up at the street with all lot of blood on our clothes... my wife said that we were missing for 5 days ! ! !
content.shape: Blimp,   Boomerang,   Bullet,   Missile,   Cigar,   Cone,   Chevron,   Circle,   Cross,   Cylinder,   Diamond,   Egg,   Fireball,   Flash,   Oval,   Saturn-like,   Sphere,   Square,   Rectagular,   Star-like,   Teardrop,   Triangle,   Other,   Unknown
content.summary: Unknown flying object seen and contact with extra terrestrials !

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing out on our porch enjoying a cig, when i noticed what i thought was a lonely cloud in the sky hovering to the south west. i went in to fetch my camera, since it looked interesting enough to be photographed and i told my girlfriend that i was going to take a few shots of a really cute little cloud i was witnessing. the sky was completely clear in the area of the cloud, and i thought it cool; i was in a hurry to get my camera, so the cloud would not disperse. when i came back out, the cloud had not at all dispersed, but remained intact and in the same shape as when i left it.

i started taking several photographs of the object as it "sailed" slowly to the west. the sky was clear, only displaying some light cloud formations far to the south, but nothing in the area of the object of my interest. i took photographs and studied the object as it continued its slow passage over the sky in the western direction. a light, cold, wind came in from the north.

i stopped photographing when the object disappeared from my view behind the tree tops. during all this time it did not change shape, like a regular cloud, but indeed seemed solid. there was no sound of airplanes in the vicinity. the object seemed to be flying in the air about one or two kilometres from me, and when it disappeared behind the trees it was far away, leading me to believe that it was no small balloon or anything in that category. i know of no military excercises or hellicopter flights being arranged in my area at the time of the sighting either. the object seemed silent and i heard no sound of it.

the sun was up to the south and seemed to shed its northern european winter light on the object. i took a whole series of photos of the object as it flew over the sky; with different zoom levels and i included parts of the terrain and surroundings in some and the trees. there is also a telephone line showing in the photos which also shows the slow western travel of the object.
content.summary: An unidentified object slowly flew westwards outside my home.

content.detailedDescription: I went out side on my patio which is facing [locations removed/cms/tg] to smoke a cigerette cus my lights where turnt off dat night , goin on the object look like somebody shooted a fire work in the air those fire rockets there was no one outside there was no noise are nothing it was bout ten feet above from the light post i was stund about what i had saw i dont belive #$%& like this but how could it happen here in da hood a lot of #$%& walkn around here i was spooked i would like someone to speak with me about this to see if im crazy or not help thanks
content.summary: Fire work type 10ft above a streetlight

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home on 11/26/10 @ 2340 hours. when i turned northbound onto my street i saw what looked like a glowing orange ball of light in the sky. the ball was moving north west slowly. it was bright but not abrasive to look it. it some what had a flame-like quality on its upper half. i followed it for 1 to 2 minutes to keep it in my field of view. after about 2 min it began to pulse from bright to dim until it became a point of light and then it went completely dark. i watched the skies for about 10 minutes to see if it would return into my field of view. it did not. during and after i felt a strange calm. i had an oddly euphoric feeling about the object.
content.summary: Glowing orange ball in the sky. appeared flame-like.

content.detailedDescription: It was about six in the evening, and the sky was completely dark. i was sitting in a car waiting on a friend facing west staring at the sky and saw a bright sphere hovering about 5 miles away (near west portsmouth, ohio) at a low altitude; then the sphere suddenly plummeted out of the sky (almost like a shooting star) then completely vanished. not more than 60 seconds later an aircraft coming from the east flew in the direction of the unidentified object and circled the surrounding area for about 4 minutes and then also vanished. this plane was very large with flashing lights, but was definitely not a commercial airliner. about 2 minutes later three more aircrafts also coming from the east headed in the same direction and surveyed the area. not long after that a total of six additional planes came from various directions to the same area. after about 15 minutes in total, there were no more flashing lights from the planes and the sky was clear.
content.summary: A spherical object at a low altitude that hovered in the air then fell from the sky and vanished followed by a total of 10 planes.

content.detailedDescription:
At 9:15 p.M i was sitting on my mother-in-laws front porch looking at the stars, when an ufo flew directly overhead. the aircraft was unlike anything i have seen before or know to exist as a contemporary aircraft type.

the object was shaped like a large boomerang.  

the aircraft had no lights, but it did have approximately four reddish colored, circular-shaped parts on the underside of each "wing" with one in the" front" of the craft. the circle shapes looked like headlights which were not illuminated and each circle was covered with with a surface that looked like dark tinted glass. there was a small "cross" shape in the middle of each "light" that looked like a "plus- sign".

the object flew with a gliding motion in a straight line from the south-east toward the north-west. 

as the object initially approached my vantage-point, i could see it from directly "head-on". it appeared to be very flat, which gave me the impression that the aircraft could not have been a "manned" one.

the aircraft seemed to be flying unusually low to the ground, no more than a couple hundred feet above my head. (it was low enough for me to discern the details described  above.) the speed and altitude of the craft appeared to remain constant.

there was absolutely no sound emitted from the craft, whatsoever.

i watched the ufo until it was beyond the horizon-line, behind the house. i excitedly ran to get my husband, who came outside to watch the sky with me. after five minutes passed with nothing out of the ordinary happening, he decided to go back inside. 

no more than three minutes later the craft appeared overhead again. this time the craft was flying back from the north-west toward the same direction that it had initially appeared. i watched the craft until it crossed beyond the opposite horizon and was no longer visible.
content.summary: Boomerang shaped ufo flew over my head twice on november 25, 2010.

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend  [first name of girlfriend removed cms/dr]  had just pulled into the driveway and i was outside smoking a cigarette. i walked up to the car and around to the drivers side, facing west. she got out and we said a few words. her friend  [friends first name removed cms/dr]  got out of the car and asked me for a lighter. i handed it across the roof of the car to her. i looked past her and noticed a very bright and fast moving white light had seemingly appeared from nowhere.  at first i thought it was a shooting star. it arced across the sky, slightly downward in the same manner that one would. right as i saw it i said "look, a shooting star!" just at that moment it suddenly dipped downward, then turned up like the letter "j".  and then shot straight up into the sky and vanished.   [first name of girlfriend removed cms/dr]  looked in time only to see it disappear, while [friends first name removed cms/dr] missed the whole thing. it was unlike anything i have ever seen. i cannot express how amazing it was to see. five minutes later there were several types of aircraft in various positions in my field of vision. another five minutes later, there were no aircraft at all, which is strange since we live a few miles from camp pendleton marine base.
content.summary: Light arced across sky, dipped downward, then ascended abruptly

content.detailedDescription:
I was on vaction with my mom. we went to philidelphia to check out the sites.We actually stayed in a room in new jersey. we had just gotten back from the philidelphia zoo around 5pm. i started juggling tennis balls out behind our room. i happened to look up noticed this bright red "plane". except i have never seen a plane like this before.It was a triangle, silent, and moving very slow.I ran into the hotel yelling for my mom to look at this plane and to get my binoculars for a better look. i thought they were in a bag besides the fridge, but i left them in the car. so i ran right out to get them out of the car and when i got outside i tried to find the plane. but it was gone. i couldnt believe it. i tried to locate it on the same tradgectory that it was going.It was going so slow there is no way it could have flown by in that amount of time.I kept looking to see if it would come out of a cloud,but nothing. i continued juggling until dark with one eye always to the sky. you could see other planes flying by, they would take a while to get across the horizon. and any low flying plane is easily heard. i am still baffelled to this day as to what i saw out there.
 
here are the important topics:

1.Date 6/20/05
2.Location:roadway inn 2840 sr 73n,maple shade nj (39'56.522n 74'58.568w) room 138
3.Time: approx 5:15pm est 
4.Weather: sunny, nice out white fluffy clouds scattered about.
5.Color:brilliant fire engine red
6.Shape: triangle... "pizza slice"
7.Flight characteristics:low and slow, silent vanished without a trace. flying se at last glance
8. definetly something machanical i thought it was a plane at first site.
content.summary: Was out juggling, looked up saw red triangular " plane". ran inside hotel for binocuars,they were in car. by the time i ran out it was gone

content.detailedDescription:
Just as the sun was going down on the the 15th of november at around 5 or quarter past 5, i was driving up highlands road and i saw a pudding shape object appear above my windshield just as if it had been above the car. it shot north following the road. 

as it was above the car when i first saw it, it looked more like a disk, but as it shot forward it took on more of a pudding shape not unlike a dome but it was not a disk. it shot forward from around several hundred yards ahead of the car to out of sight in a couple of seconds. just as it disappeared i saw several yellow balls or orbs streaking forward in the same direction.

i stopped my car to get my camera out of the trunk but by the time i did that there was nothing.

i have been watching the news and reading the papers ever since and i have seen nothing about it anywhere. i found out about mufon so i am reporting it. surely other people saw this? you could not miss it. it flew over at least a dozen cars and probably many more that i could not see. maybe hundreds of cars. it must have been seen by many dozens of people or even more. maybe hundreds.

it seemed to be around the size of a car. it is hard to tell but it was not very big. it was around 12 feet wide. it could maybe have been 20 feet. it seemed to be around 100 feet off the ground. maybe 200, but as it shot off it elevated in height of miles which is why many people must have seen it.

i hope that by making this report maybe some other people will come forward with photos. it is hard for me to believe that i am the only person who saw this ufo. i know that other people must have seen it. i can't believe that i am the only person who witnessed that object.

it was not a plane or a helicopter. it was not anything i have ever seen. it shot off at such a speed, it could not have been anything man made. it went from here to gone in seconds.

i am not into ufo's or anything and i would never have believed in them, but after seeing this object, i don't know what to think. i really don't know. i ave never seen anything like it. i find it hard to believe we can build anything that can move that fast.
content.summary: Pudding (dome) shape object at great speed.

content.detailedDescription:
I was letting my dog, wuf, out for some fresh air when i noticed a bright light over the city skyline. i immediately grabbed my phone to take a picture and i'm glad i did that because two seconds later the light suddenly took off at incredible speed.
it can't have been a falling star or an airplane, because they don't move that fast.

did anybody else see it?
content.summary: Saw ufo enjoying beer.

content.detailedDescription:
I was on a red-eye flight from long beach to washington, d.C.  it was a pretty empty flight, maybe 20 or 30 passengers.  i was seated in a window seat in a row with no other passengers.  as we took off, i watched the night-time traffic below.  i noticed that along a hillside road that was lit with streetlamps, there was what i thought initially to be an automobile speeding down the road going way too fast.  it was following the roadway, so i thought it was on the road.  because we were off the ground and far enough away, i looked over to the main roadway to compare the speed of other traffic with the hillside object's.  the main traffic was creeping along while this golden light was zipping.  at the moment i realized how extraordinarily fast it was going, it zigged off the roadway over the hillside and i realized it was actually flying.  it zagged in the opposite direction, then zigged a third time as it skimmed over the water and i could see it's light reflected greenish underneath it on the water.  i continued to watch and then it submerged into the water, the light turned from gold to green as it did so.  it descended deeper and i watched as it disappeared and the water went dark.  i continued to watch for a minute or so to see if it came back up.  nothing happened.  i looked around to see if anyone else had been looking out the window.  there was nobody behind me.  there was a man across the aisle in a row all to himself, like i was, and he was reading a book.  i looked to the front of the plane to see the stewardess standing in the aisle straightening magazines or something, but clearly she had not been looking out the window to see anything i had seen.  i didn't say anything to anyone because there was really nobody to say anything to.  i'd never seen anything like it and wondered what it could have been.  it was confusing and made me think about it, realizing that i couldn't find any explanation for it.  i knew it wasn't a crash, because the water wasn't disturbed as it submerged.  it just seemed to sink in and it's speed didn't really change.

i never mentioned it to anybody and forgot about for about six months when one day i turned on the history channel and a man was on the screen describing objects people had seen flying into and out of the water.  they were called usos.  i had turned the tv on about halfway through the program and watched it until the end.  i finally knew what i had seen - a uso.  i went to the library and checked out eery book i could find on usos and even ufos.  i read and watched any other program available on the history channel and other channels about these incidents.  now i know it isn't so uncommon.
content.summary: Watched a golden ball of light zig zag down a hillside and descend into the water.

content.detailedDescription:
I was putting our cat out and picking our paper up off our walk this morning at about 6:19 or 6:20am pst.  there were stars, the partial moon, and passing clouds.  

i always look up into the sky when i go out (we have no street lights in our neighborhood, so it's usually easy to stargaze), and in the dark morning sky i spotted a single light moving very smoothly, perhaps 10 - 20 degrees below the moon, towards the lower right side (from my perspective) moving towards the northwest.  if i had to guess its altitude i would say it was in orbit and outside of our atmosphere.  it was white, a touch yellowish, appeared bright but to be at a very high altitude because its movement was fairly quick yet it wasn't passing through a great deal of the sky (it could be that it was traveling away from my perspective at a slight trajectory).  if i'd put my hand out toward it - it would be (at my arm's length) about the size of a seed bead.  

i watched it for a second assuming it was a satellite, when i looked around it and saw a second one moving in exact tandem with it at a distance of perhaps (from my arm's length) a half a foot, to the left, away from the first one.  it was probably about 15 - 20 degrees to the lower left side of the moon (from my perspective), moving in the exact same speed and northwestern direction as the first light.  the second one was the same: speed, trajectory, size, and color as the first.  though, the first light (to the lower right of the moon) was brighter than the second one (that was on the lower left side of the moon, from my vantage point) and that might be because it was somewhat closer.

i am aware that it is not unusual for people, during a sighting, to see three lights, moving in tandem, in triangular formation; so i searched for a third light but did not see one.  this does not mean that a third light was not there, as there was cloud cover moving over perhaps (on average, over the entire sky) one fifth of the sky, at that time.  i never saw a third light, though.  i only saw the two.

we see satellites, here, all of the time when observing the night sky and these were brighter (larger, too) than satellites.  but, i've never seen two satellites moving together, exactly.  these were.

i ran back in to grab my cell to use its video camera, found it, ran back out, located the two objects in the sky, again, and shot footage.  the cell, unfortunately, could not detect the lights (perhaps because they were so close to the moon (fairly bright) and clouds (white) and the contrast was too much for the small (not high def) video camera?).  i've attached them, here, anyway.

as i filmed, they moved in tandem (keep their exact same distance from each other always, never changing size or color or brightness, throughout my sighting), maintained their trajectory but never did seem to travel much of the sky as they both seemed to be moving away from my perspective.  it wasn't that they got dimmer or smaller but rather, (and i know that this sounds odd) they seemed to be moving at a steady and fair pace, but never traveled that much of the sky.  the only way i could perceive what i was seeing was to think 'perhaps they're moving away from my perspective'.  clouds would float between them and i, but weren't thick (at first) so, they'd re-emerge.  when each light went behind clouds and were hidden behind them (they didn't re-emerge) i stopped filming.

i filmed two videos, in total.

i did go out, about a minute after filming, to see if they were still there - but i could not detect them as the sun started rising at about 6:30am or so, this morning.

could what i saw have been satellites?  yes.  though, i looked at nasa's human space flight sky log database/site, right after my sighting, and searched for my location and the appropriate time, but did not see any two satellites that moved in the same direction at exactly the same time listed there (for my location and that time).  so, i have not proven that they were satellites.  

i've never seen satellites move in tandem or appear to move away from the planet, so i thought i'd report these.
content.summary: 112610, oregon, two lights moving in tandem in early dark

content.detailedDescription:
My bf and i were outside with the dogs talking.  suddenly he said "what the hell is that?" and pointed toward the north/northeast.  i stood up and looked in the direction he was pointing and saw a bright blue circular light moving in looping movenments in the air.  it would hover for a second or two then descend toward the ground.  other times it would move thru the air with a looping motion.  its movements never seemed to be in a straight path, it constantly looped or made curvy motions thru the air or it would rise or descend/drop out of viewing range as if it were lowering all the way to the ground.  then about ten, fifteen, twenty seconds later it would rise and do all the movements again.  sometimes when it hovered it would turn bright white but only for a second or two then it returned to the bright blue color.

it did seem to travel at a very fast pace.  my bf seemed to be more awestruck/confused by the speed and i was more awestruck/confused by the looping movements and suddeny descending to the ground.  there are houses across the street from our backyard so the light disappeared below the roofs of these homes and we stood on patio chairs for much of the sighting and we stood on the chais for much of the sighting.

most of the movements were between 250 and 500 feet.  sometimes when it rose in the air it got as high as 750 feet (i guess).  i don't know how exactly how low it got because of the roofs of the houses in our way.

i did film three video clips but i don't know if my digital camera is good enough to pick up the lights in nighttime darkness.  (or i don't know how to "program" to accomplish it.)  and i also took some pics with no flash and did see that i did capture the light, altho' i have to zoom to get a really good look.  [which i'm uploading to my comp after i file this report.]

i've seen a lot of strange lights, fireballs, etc. in this area since i moved into this house three years ago.  this one was by far the best and most amazing sighting so far.  and i have a witness
content.summary: Circular bright blue light looping in the air

content.detailedDescription: I am a truck driver.  the one route i drive daily is near a heavly traveled fly zone.  it is not uncommon to see 5 to 7 jet contrails at one time.   i was looking at 5 different jet contrails and noticed what appeared to be an airplane.   the sun reflected off of this object and caught my attention.  the object was flying in an easterly direction at about the same speed a prop driven airplane would be going. i could not tell what shape the object was.  i was about to give up trying to see what it was when the object changed it's flight by going 90 degrees north. the change in direction was in a second and in an other second it diappeared from my sight. this object did not leave any contrails nor was i able to hear if it made any noise due to the noise of my truck engine. most airplane contrails go from east to west in this area, some come up from the south. the time of this sighting was about 4pm on november 8, 2010. i told my wife and a few friends about the sighting but they did not seem excited as i did about seeing it.
content.summary: Unknown reflective object changed it's flight 90 degrees and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: It was still light out but the sun had just begun to set and i was driving home.  i saw a bright light in the sky above the trees in my neighborhood.  i pulled over and started taking close up pictures thinking it was mars.  when i zoomed out i saw three bright lights in formation and hovering.  then another white light rose from the horizon with two smaller lights.  all orb shaped and bright. they stayed in the same place for several minutes and then slowly left one at a time following each other. as they changed direction i could see the front had two bright white lights and the back two red lights.  in continuous shot mode i finally got a close up of the last craft as it was moving away. i then thought "got ya".  don't know what it is but i got a picture of it and two short videos of them hovering.  it looks like a small star ship enterprise.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Was photographing a star, i thought.  then four white lights came over the horizon hovered, no sound.  then changed direction and left one at a time.

content.detailedDescription: 6:45pm, clear skies, no wind, 39 degrees outside, no planes visible. i stepped outside to have a cigarette in my back yard, looked up toward the south and at about 45 degrees up i saw what at first looked to be the white wings of birds in a v shape moving from east to west but as i looked it was moving too fast to be any birds and was apparent it was an object with a body with luminous dots (don't know quite how to explain it, it wasn't lights but could make them out faintly, like they were almost in a mist). object emitted no sound. i stepped back to see around the shop we have that was blocking my view to see if i could still see it and i could. i watched still going west until it was out of sight. i have seen many flocks of geese (i lived in jackson, wy. for 25 years) and these were not geese or birds of any kind. this had a body that was barely there (hard to explain). it had to be rather large object but move fast making no sound. when i realized it wasn't birds, i knew it was a ufo, i was in awe, i wasn't scare, i just wanted to watch it. i felt like getting in the car to chase it but knew it was way gone. i hope this makes sense to you. sorry, no photos, there wouldn't have been time to get the camera. *(wit's first name deleted--cms/sg).
content.summary: Luminous white dots (not bright) in a triangle shape

content.detailedDescription:
I was 16 years old and was driving around the town of belle, missouri, where i have lived all my life, on my way to work at a local cafe and i was coming down 8th street toward hwy. 28, and when i got to the stop sign at hwy 28, it caught my eyes, across the highway off to the right a little bit, it was so big, i couldn't miss it! it was hovering, with no noise what so ever, just staying in one spot, a black triangular ship with lights on the three corners, which were rounded just a little and also windows going all the way around it, as far as i could see. it was unbeleiveably huge! i drove across highway 28 and stopped for a moment, then it hovered back into the woods off to the right a bit, but i could still see it there. it really scared & astonished me, i had to calm myself down a little,(i was afraid to get out of my car and start yelling and pointing), so then i drove into a parking lot to the left of the street and headed back down highway 28 to get to work. i told a few people at work, but no one really believed me-i was still really shock up.  

this was before i had ever drank alcohol, smoked marijuana or anythng, so i know what i saw was there. after that i was always prone to a lot of nervous anxiety, insomnia, and depression.  still to this day i have to take xanax to help avoid panic attacks, which have landed me in the hospital a few times, thinking i was having a heart atack.
content.summary: Afternoon-i saw a triangluar black ship with lights on the 3 corners and a row of windows around the ship

content.detailedDescription:
My wife( skeptic) and i were sitting in our back yard enjoying outside fire and star gazing.
i notice high overhead a liminus light traveling at high speed to the nne. at first i thought it was a plane.  the light seem to be oval, almoct disk shaped, with the light or the whole body  being constant. also there were 2 luminus lights, 1 on each end of the oval or disk body that flashed on and stayed on for about one second then off for a second then on again. when the outboard lights were on, those lights made the craft appear to be solid from one side to the other and the outboard lights thicker than the disk or oval was. i asked the wife if she saw the lights. her answer was "what the --- is that"? i told her i didn't know. speed was faster than any commercial or military aircraft i have seen here from my yard. i live in tampa air traffic control area. there was no sound . there was also no red or green navigational lights or beacon light visible from my point of observation.I got the feeling i was looking at a solid body that was giving off its own light.  there was a broken overcast with a cloud base of 10 to 1500 ft.Agl. altitude of object was probably 30,000 to 50,000 agl. craft may have been larger than a c-5a galaxy. object was in viewing area about 30 seconds. lost sight after it passed over clouds. only feeling i had was how lucky i was to see a possible ufo with my skeptic wife. next morning i got up early to watch iss pass overhead for comparrison. iss was not near as fast or large , but was a beautiful sight as it passed by venus in the early morning sky. this evening, thanksging, i made another eving fire to sit outside, enjoy the weather and star gaze again. happen to see a bright meteor, i pointed it out to my wife. it was visible so long she moved out of her chair to see it pass over tree we were sitting under.This also was not like the the sighting we had 2 days ago.She said i should report this, maybe someone else saw it.
content.summary: Luminus white oval light traveling nne, silently with larger luminius lights flashing on the ends of the oval  on for 1 sec, off for 1 sec
